mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS® High Sierra or greater
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 Drivers
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: TOCOViX Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or greater
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 Drivers
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Place Crosses on the game board and complete Shapes. Earn Stops to block your opponents and make your way to victory! Play with your friends on the same device or challenge other players Online.
